name: Verdant (GGJ - Ver 1.0)
description:
Verdant is a stealth, puzzle horror game. You play as the last of the tree folk who have horribly been taken over and infected by mysterious mycelium entity. Avoid the infected by using your wits and cunning. Purify the roots and make your home safe again, but watch where you walk, the elder tree sees you as a threat.

(p.s this was made in a 48 hour jam, the level is not completed but is a demonstration of the game concept. A future, more polished edition will be published at a later date.)
